ygData.subject: Re: More clues from Lindell, third book confirmed, and more...
ygData.msgSnippet: Why do people have to keep playing games with us?  There s no reason not to share this information other then to make us mad.  It s not like they re profiting
ygData.messageBody:
Why do people have to keep playing games with us? There's no reason not to
share this information other then to make us mad. It's not like they're
profiting off this information. The knowledge for the other trade skills
are always shared immediately. Like when the new silk and cured silk was
introduced, the word was spread in days. And people are making a lot of
money from making the silk armor. (I've personally made over 600pp selling
suits of cured silk armor to high level monks) Yet this tinkering info must
have been around for months yet the few people who know won't tell anyone
else even tho there's no profit to be made in making a collapseable fishing
pole. *sighs*

If the people who know where to get this book were on the Erollisi Marr
server, I'd gladly offer 100pp for the book (maybe more), just because it
drives me nuts not knowing.

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org
"Linux... find out what you've been missing while
you've been rebooting Windows NT" - Infoworld
